page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: BARRY SCHOOL,IS SITUATED OF THE WEST END OF CARNOUSTIE AND DATES BACK OVER 100 YEARS. TODAY IT HAS 55 PUPILS IN 3 CLASSROOMS WITH 3 TEACHERS,THE HEAD TEACHER ALSO TEACHING THE OLDEST PUPILS.THROUGHOUT THE SCHOOL YEAR PUPILS ENJOY A VARIETY OF SCHOOL ACTIVITIES WHICH FURTHER THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF THEIR ENVIRONMENT.DURING 1984-85 PUPILS HAVE UNDERTAKEN HILL WALKING AT GLEN CLOVA ,BREAD MAKING, A WATER STUDY AT A NATURE RESERVE,BATIK WORK,PLANTING TREES VISITING DUNDEE MUSEUM AS PART OF AN EARLY HISTORY STUDY,SKIING AT THE MARINE BASE IN CONDOR AND MAKING MUSIC ON PROJECT THEMES. BARRY SCHOOL ALSO TAKES PART IN NETBALL,SWIMMING,BADMINTON AND FOOTBALL WITH RURAL SCHOOLS NEARBY.
